titles.title: Alien Child Organ Transplant Act of 2002
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under the Medicaid Program of organ transplant procedures as an emergency medical procedure for certain alien children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/25/2002--Introduced. Alien Child Organ Transplant Act of 2002 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide for Medicaid coverage of organ transplant procedures considered as an emergency medical procedure for certain alien children under age 18.
